CustomField.formula:
If( ISBLANK (New_Case_Date_Completed__c) ,( Today() - DateValue( New_Case_Date_Received__c ) -2*(floor(( Today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(( DateValue(New_Case_Date_Received__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
((DateValue( New_Case_Date_Completed__c) - DateValue( New_Case_Date_Received__c ) - 2*( floor((DateValue( New_Case_Date_Completed__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DateValue( New_Case_Date_Received__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))))
CustomField.label: NC Case Age Excluding Weekends
